description: This super-light, super-warm down belay parka that shines on lightand- fast alpine pushes everywhere from Alaska to Patagonia, the Phantom™ Parka is loaded with 800-fill, RDS®-certified down that provides high-lofting, highly packable warmth for belays, bivies and bone-chilling temps.
name: Mountain Hardwear Phantom Parka - Mens

specs.value: 800 Fill RDS-Certified Down - 90% Goose Down, 10% Down Feathers
